sent.orig: Perform a hero living, li Ling guides examine, perform a hero gone.
sent.trans: 演主人公活著，李领导审查，就演主人公死去。

sent.orig: Choose classmates to help perform the play. Rehearse and perform for the class.
sent.trans: 选择同学帮助进行表演。在班级排练和表演。

sent.orig: The common language runtime allows code to perform only those operations code has permission to perform.
sent.trans: 公共语言运行时允许代码仅执行它有权执行的操作。

sent.orig: Perform preparation of tensile and impact and bend sample, in addition, perform mechanical testing.
sent.trans: 完成拉伸，冲击和弯曲等试样的制备，并做好力学性能测试。

sent.orig: A turnaround requires abandoning whatever does not perform and doing more of what does perform.
sent.trans: 要转向就要放弃不起作用的部分，并多做起作用的那一部分。
